import React from 'react' import { PhotoIcon, UserCircleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function Checkout() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const user = useSelector((state) => state.user.userInfo); const items = useSelector((state) => state.cart.items); const status = useSelector((state) => state.order.status); const currentOrder = useSelector((state) => state.order.currentOrder); const totalAmount = items.reduce( (amount, item) => item.product.discountPrice * item.quantity + amount, 0 ); const totalItems = items.reduce((total, item) => item.quantity + total, 0); return (
